DOC.brief_summary: Objective study comparative assessment beneficial impact Viscoat viscoelastic ( OVD ) Visthesia OVD endothelial cell corneal edema follow torsional-ip cataract extraction surgery . Participants recruit Cataract Service University Hospital Alexandroupolis ( UHA ) consecutive-if-eligible basis . Eligibility criterion include diagnosis senile cataract stage 3 nuclear opalescence accord Lens Opacities Classification System III ( LOCS-3 ) grade scale . By mean custom computer randomization program participant randomly populate two study group accord OVD use ( ie . viscoat visthesia ) .
DOC.brief_title: Viscoat Versus Visthesia . A Comparative Study Post-cataract Endothelial Cell Loss
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis senile cataract stage 3 nuclear opalescence accord Lens Opacities Classification System III ( LOCS3 ) grade scale Endothelial cell count less 1900 , glaucoma , IOPlowering medication , former incisional surgery , former diagnosis corneal disease , diabetes autoimmune disease
